t: VPS+2+6 一键脚本菜单 2025 版 🚀

acs.t:
VPS 脚本 - Serv00 2025 🚀

1. 三协议安装:
wget -qO- https://raw.githubusercontent.com/eooce/sing-box/test/sb_00.sh | bash

2. 四合一隧道:
wget -qO- https://raw.githubusercontent.com/eooce/sing-box/main/sb_serv00.sh | bash

3. 清理进程:
pkill -kill -u [用户名]

4. 卸载 Dashboard:
pgrep -f 'dashboard' | xargs kill && rm -rf ~/.nezha-dashboard

5. 哪吒探针:
wget -qO- https://raw.githubusercontent.com/amclubs/am-serv00-nezha/main/install-dashboard.sh | bash

6. Hysteria 2:
wget -qO- https://get.hy2.sh | bash
